question_1.question: Where in the TimeXtender Portal can you create a new API key?

options.option_a: Under Admin, then Security and permissions
options.option_d: In the Help and Support section

question_1.explanation: To create a new API key in TimeXtender Portal, you navigate to Admin and then to Security and permissions as per the provided instructions.

question_2.question: What is the first step to delete an API key in the TimeXtender Portal?

options.option_a: Type the name of the API key to confirm deletion
options.option_b: Navigate to Security and permissions and select the delete icon next to the API key
options.option_c: Add a Comment stating the reason for deletion
options.option_d: Select Delete to confirm and finalize the deletion

question_2.explanation: The first step to delete an API key is to navigate to Security and permissions and select the delete icon next to the API key.

question_3.question: What should you do immediately after generating a new API key?

options.option_a: Select Close to close the window
options.option_b: Select Copy and save the key in a secure location
options.option_c: Provide a name for the API key
options.option_d: Navigate back to the main dashboard

question_3.explanation: After generating a new API key, it is crucial to select Copy and save the key in a secure location because it will not be visible again.

question_4.question: What must you do to confirm the deletion of an API key?

options.option_b: Type the name of the API key
options.option_c: Provide a reason for deletion in the comments
options.option_d: Select Delete to confirm and finalize the deletion

question_4.explanation: To confirm the deletion of an API key, you must select Delete to confirm and finalize the deletion process.

question_5.question: Why is it important to save the API key in a secure location after creation?

options.option_a: Because it will be needed for future logins
options.option_b: Because it can be used to track API usage
options.option_c: Because it will not be visible again after creation
options.option_d: Because it is required for deleting the API key later

question_5.explanation: It is important to save the API key in a secure location because once it is generated and you navigate away from the page, it will not be visible again for security reasons.

question_6.question: Before finalizing the deletion of an API key, what additional step is recommended for logging purposes?

options.option_a: Copy the API key to a backup location
options.option_b: Add a Comment stating the reason for deletion
options.option_c: Notify all team members about the deletion
options.option_d: Create a new API key as a replacement

question_6.explanation: Adding a Comment stating the reason for deletion is recommended as part of logging, which can be found under Admin > Activities, to maintain a record of why the API key was deleted.
